title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
summary: Implement a secure multi-factor authentication framework to protect user access.
description: Develop a secure login and authentication mechanism that leverages multi-factor options such as passwords, OTPs, and biometric verification where applicable. Ensure encrypted data transmission, session management, and automatic timeouts to prevent unauthorized access. The authentication system must comply with financial and regulatory requirements, ensuring both robust protection and a smooth user experience for customers accessing the self-service portal.

title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
summary: Design a responsive self-service interface with personalized dashboard capabilities.
description: Create a responsive, device-agnostic user interface that delivers a modern experience across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Develop a personalized customer dashboard displaying account details, relevant products, and qualified service offers based on the user’s profile and preferences. Focus on intuitive navigation, accessibility compliance, and interface uniformity to improve usability and customer satisfaction.

title: Core Banking Integration and Database Optimization
summary: Integrate with the bank’s core systems and establish a high-performing database layer.
description: Develop secure APIs for real-time and asynchronous integration with the existing core banking systems. Implement a dedicated portal database to store session data, form inputs, and request logs optimized for quick response times and minimal latency. Introduce data synchronization routines, ensure referential integrity, and enable monitoring and backup mechanisms to maintain performance, reliability, and business continuity.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
summary: Enable users to initiate and manage account openings and modifications via digital workflows.
description: Build streamlined, guided workflows for initiating account opening and service modification requests online. Minimize manual data entry through form auto-population, preset options, and profile-based recommendations. Integrate backend automation to forward submissions to the appropriate processing systems and allow customers to save incomplete applications, returning later to complete from the same point without data loss.

title: Document Upload and Management System
summary: Implement a secure document submission and management module for user convenience.
description: Develop functionality that allows customers to upload identification and supporting documents during various application or service processes. Ensure documents are validated for file type and size, scanned for malware, encrypted at rest and in transit, and categorized properly for automated processing. Enable users to review uploaded files and replace documents if needed while maintaining version traceability and compliance.

title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notification System
summary: Provide real-time tracking of applications with intelligent email and SMS notifications.
description: Design and implement a centralized tracking engine that gives customers live updates on the progress of account openings, modifications, and other submitted requests. Integrate with email and SMS services to notify users about important timeline events such as application approvals, documentation requirements, or rejections. Ensure visibility of request history and maintain a synchronized status view visible on the customer dashboard.

title: Comprehensive User Interaction History and Audit Trails
summary: Maintain detailed records of all user interactions for transparency and compliance.
description: Implement an interaction history system that stores and displays all past actions, requests, and transactions initiated by the customer within the portal. Ensure data accuracy, immutability, and time-stamped logging of each interaction. Provide user-facing views for request summaries and backend audit logs for compliance, monitoring, and operational analytics purposes, ensuring data retention aligns with financial regulations.

title: Role-Based Access Control and User Permissions Management
summary: Enforce role-based access control to govern user permissions and service restrictions.
description: Develop a role-based access control (RBAC) mechanism to define distinct access levels for various categories such as retail customers, admins, and service agents. Ensure logical segregation of permissions to prevent unauthorized data access and restrict functionality visibility based on role definitions. Allow administrative users to assign, modify, or revoke permissions while maintaining audit logs of all access-level activity.

title: Data Security, Privacy, and Regulatory Compliance Framework
summary: Implement advanced data protection, auditing, and compliance processes for customer security.
description: Introduce multilayered data security controls including full encryption, secure key management, intrusion detection, and encryption key rotation. Align solutions with financial compliance standards such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and local banking regulations. Conduct regular vulnerability testing, perform continuous monitoring for anomalies, and produce compliance reports to assure trusted operations across all portal modules.
